description:
Nelson MacNeil Rayfield Trial Attorneys P.C., is dedicated to fighting insurance companies and protecting consumer rights. The law firm represents individuals who have been injured in accidents, such as car accidents, that were caused by the negligence of others.

With more than 70 years of collective legal and trial experience, the lawyers at the firm have the skills needed to provide high-quality representation to plaintiffs in personal injury lawsuits. For each case, the firm's attorneys conduct a thorough investigations, hire necessary experts, read carefully through incident reports and develop a legal strategy designed to place you in the best possible position for a successful outcome. They know that no amount of money will change what happened, but it is important to hold negligent parties responsible for their actions.

The firm practices exclusively in the area of personal injury throughout the state of Oregon. By narrowly tailoring the practice, the firm's attorneys are able to provide superior representation for their clients — guiding them through the legal process, handling paperwork and dealing with insurance companies. Insurance companies may try to take advantage of you in your vulnerable situation. The lawyers at the firm handle all communications with insurance companies on your behalf to ensure that you receive fair compensation for your injuries and pain.

When you are injured in a car accident or other accident caused by the negligence of another, Nelson MacNeil Rayfield Trial Attorneys, P.C., is here for you. The firm offers evening and weekend appointments upon request, and if you are unable to come to one of the firm's offices, the firm's lawyers can travel to you.
